title: Crazy quilt

Inscription

second row of blocks in from one lo
description: crazy quilt pieced with square blocks overall, front and back, of various fabrics; edged in two different floral prints; knotted with tan cording; hand-sewn
creditline: Gift of Mary Lou Judd Carpenter and her sisters in honor of their father, former 5th District Congressman, Dr. Walter H. Judd
